This mixin outputs small (s) font-sized text on mobile devices and, by default, scales up to medium (m) on larger devices.

Usage:

@include typography-text-small;

This mixin accepts arguments, as outlined below:

Parameter Purpose Usage
m Default value, up-sized to medium @include typography-text-small;
ml Up-sizes to medium-large on non-mobile devices @include typography-text-small('ml');

Examples:

    Default usage

The output from this mixin looks like this.

    Using ml

The output from this mixin looks like this.
